law.text: The department shall employ boiler inspectors who shall have had at the time of appointment not less than five (5) years practical experience in the construction, maintenance, repair, or operation of high pressure boilers and pressure vessels as a mechanical engineer, practical steam operating engineer, boilermaker, pressure vessel inspector or boiler inspector, and who shall have passed the examination provided for in KRS 236.090.
law.history: Amended 2012 Ky. Acts ch. 14, sec. 7, effective July 12, 2012. -- Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 520, effective July 15, 2010. -- Amended 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 207, sec. 8, effective July 15, 1980. -- Created 1962 Ky. Acts ch. 89, sec. 7.
